sentences.en: A lot hinges on how we are viewed by overseas investors.
sentences.cn: 很多事都取决于海外投资者对我们的看法。

sentences.en: Bananas are packed before being transported to the docks for shipment overseas.
sentences.cn: 香蕉在运到码头发往海外之前已经装箱。

sentences.en: Chris is going to work overseas.
He has returned to South Africa from his long overseas trip.
sentences.cn: 他结束了漫长的海外旅行回到南非。

sentences.en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentences.cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

sentences.en: Life was now drab compared with the more exciting life style overseas.
sentences.cn: 比起海外那种更富有刺激的生活方式来,现在的生活显得了无生气.

sentences.en: Many firms are concentrating on increasing their markets overseas.
sentences.cn: 许多公司正在集中精力开拓它们的海外市场.

sentences.en: Many firms are focusing on increasing their markets overseas.
sentences.cn: 许多商行都专注于扩大国外市场.

sentences.en: Overseas the legal issues are more muddied.
sentences.cn: 在海外，法律问题更为繁复。

sentences.en: Relevant work experience is required for overseas postings.
sentences.cn: 派驻海外要求有相关的工作经验。

sentences.en: The dollar's recent strength is crimping overseas sales and profits.
sentences.cn: 美元最近的坚挺影响了国外的销量和利润。

sentences.en: the enlargement of the company's overseas business activities
The news from overseas is overwhelmingly negative.
sentences.cn: 来自海外的消息特别不容乐观。

sentences.en: The prices of overseas holidays are subject to surcharges.
sentences.cn: 海外度假游的价格受各种附加费的影响。

sentences.en: The University has a well-established tradition of welcoming postgraduate students from overseas.
sentences.cn: 这所大学有着欢迎海外研究生就读的悠久传统。

sentences.en: They are no longer part of a duopoly on overseas routes.
sentences.cn: 他们不再是垄断海外航线的两强之一。

phrases.tran_cn: 国外分支机构；海外分店

trans.tran_en: coming from, existing in, or happening in a foreign country that is across the sea
to or in a foreign country that is across the sea
